name: Batman - The Caped Crusader [C64]
description:
Batman: The Caped Crusader is an arcade game developed by Special FX Software. It came out on 01-01-1988. It was published by Data East. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Batman: The Caped Crusader is available on Atari ST, Apple II, Commodore / Amiga and PC.
